ORSHIN Attack Defense Framework

UV erase of Protection bits

Description

UV erase of Protection bits

CWE

CVE

Attack Surfaces

Memory (MITRE EMB3D PID-12)

Attack Vectors

ROM Extraction (MITRE EMB3D TID-108)

UV Illumination

Defenses

Flash memory should not be used to store security flags, Use fuse instead, Mix flags with other data, UV light sensors
